content: My dear brothers and sisters, if you could have one wish for your family, what would it be? I know what mine would be. If I could have one wish for every member of this Church, it would be for each of us to think celestial. Too many people think telestial and live telestial lives. We can do better!
speaker: Russell M. Nelson
title: Think Celestial!

content: There is something about the gospel of Jesus Christ that brings joy to the human heart. This joy comes not from the outside but from within. It is not dependent on external circumstances but on our inner relationship with God and our Savior Jesus Christ.
speaker: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
title: A Higher Joy
